title: Embryonic development: the chick
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Time lapse cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Italy - Salerno - Awards
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Microcinematography
description: This film illustrates the development of the chick embryo, through all stages from germinal disc to hatching, employing animated diagrams and cine-micrography of the living embryo. Normal-speed and time-lapse photographic sequences, and animated diagrams, sometimes superimposed on microscopic views of the embryo, are used to clarify growth processes. (Five awards, including: Salerno; Golden Reel, USA)
